Zealots ferret out plots against their religion and seek justice for their church's followers. This zealot serves [Asmodeus](/Deities.aspx?ID=2), but others might serve [Abadar](/Deities.aspx?ID=1), [Calistria](/Deities.aspx?ID=3), [Iomedae](/Deities.aspx?ID=9), [Norgorber](/Deities.aspx?ID=13), [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14), [Sarenrae](/Deities.aspx?ID=16), or [Zon-Kuthon](/Deities.aspx?ID=20). They often ride a [war horse](/Monsters.aspx?ID=268) wearing [light barding](/Rules.aspx?ID=255). This horse is an additional monster in the fight. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 19 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14 [Zealot of Asmodeus](/NPCs.aspx?ID=895) **Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 213 **Perception** +9 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +10, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +10, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +10, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +7 **Str** +4 **Dex** +1 **Con** +1 **Int** +0 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +2 **Items** [Composite Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75) (20 arrows), [Half Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=12), [Mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=7), [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 5, HP 20, BT 10) --- **AC** 22 (24 with shield raised) **Fort** +9 **Ref** +7 **Will** +11 **HP** 58 **[Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32)**
**Swear Vengeance** **Trigger** A creature the zealot can see damages a follower of [Asmodeus](/Deities.aspx?ID=2) other than the zealot; **Effect** The zealot gains the effect of a 1st-level [_true strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) spell. If the zealot makes an attack roll against anyone other than the triggering creature, the _true strike_ ends with no effect. --- **Speed** 20 feet **Melee** mace +12 ([Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)), **Damage** 1d8+4 bludgeoning **Ranged** composite shortbow +9 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d6+2 piercing **Divine Prepared Spells** DC 19, attack +11 - **Cantrips (2nd)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Forbidding Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=126), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Sigil](/Spells.aspx?ID=286) - **1st** [Detect Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=65), [Magic Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=182), [Spirit Link](/Spells.aspx?ID=302) - **2nd** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (x3), [Restoration](/Spells.aspx?ID=258), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271), [Shield Other](/Spells.aspx?ID=281) **Channel Smite** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118)) The zealot expends a prepared [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) spell and makes a melee Strike. Instead of the normal effect of the spell, its negative damage is added to the Strike's damage. **Deadly Simplicity** The zealot's mace deals 1d8 damage instead of 1d6.
name: Zealot of Asmodeus
